name: International Conference on Cannabis and Medicinal Research
content: Cientific Group believes in providing a juncture for all the research writers across the world to showcase and flourish at " International Conference on Cannabis and Medicinal Research" which is going to be held in Osaka, Japan during September 11-12, 2019\. Cannamed-2019 aims in delivering Neurology related scientists to explore and combine research of their interest with international pioneers in a general fundamental session. For More Information : https://www.worldneurologyconferences.com/cannabis/
